ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Kunark: first impressions
ygData.msgSnippet: ah that would be nice then.  also i wonder if there is a full set or just pieces.  plus, verant usually doesn t change the stats of existing items, but i guess
ygData.messageBody:
ah that would be nice then. also i wonder if there is a full set or just
pieces. plus, verant usually doesn't change the stats of existing items,
but i guess that's only when they nerf. if they are adding stats (wait, has
verant ever done this? hehe) it may be to all existing and future items.

Shada Powa, L51 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
